org.omg.PortableServer

Interface POAManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDLEntity, Object, POAManagerOperations, Serializable

    public interface POAManager
extends POAManagerOperations, Object, IDLEntity
    Each POA object has an associated POAManager object. A POA manager may be associated with one or more POA objects. A POA manager encapsulates the processing state of the POAs it is associated with.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.omg.PortableServer.POAManagerOperations

        activate, deactivate, discard_requests, get_state, hold_requests

      • Methods inherited from interface org.omg.CORBA.Object

        _create_request, _create_request, _duplicate, _get_domain_managers, _get_interface_def, _get_policy, _hash, _is_a, _is_equivalent, _non_existent, _release, _request, _set_policy_override
